node.text: You stand before a creaking, old mansion. Thunder rumbles overhead. The door is slightly ajar.
You step inside. The hallway is dark, lit only by a flickering chandelier. You see a staircase going up and a door to the left.

choices.choice: Enter the door on the left

node.text: You run as fast as you can. You trip on a root and fall into a mud puddle. At least you are safe from the ghosts.
You climb the stairs. Suddenly, a ghost appears and says 'BOO!'. You faint.
You find a kitchen. There is a delicious cake on the table. You eat it and feel happy.
